publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 23
ab.l: Miźmoru David́niń H ḱut́uv́č́um eksik bolmammyn.
Jaš č́eb́ar orunda jatyrɣyzdy ḿeni suvlar ašyra tynčlyḥ byla ḱońd́ardi ḿeni.
Ǯanymny tynč et́ar ḱoń- d́arir ḿeni yzlary byla rastlyḥnyn šemi üč́uń.
Daɣy ki üŕuśam tuman eniš́ĺard́a qorḥmammyn jamandan ki śenin bolušluɣuj bir- ǵaḿa Torej da micvalaryj alar uvutsunlar ḿeni.
T́uźuǵuń alnym- da stol qaršysyna tar b́eŕuv́č́uĺarimniń b́eǵov́ŕat́kiń jav byla bašymny qovušum bolsun b́eǵovrejdoɣon.
T́ek jaḥsylyḥ da ševaɣat quvsunlar ḿeni bar t́erlik ḱuńĺarimd́a da olturušum bolgej ju- v́uńd́a H-nyn uzaḥ ḱuńĺarǵa.
